Capabilities and Projects

We have partnered with a wide array of clients to deliver complex design/build and value-added engineering work for marquee end-customers

DPR Construction

Riverside Regional Medical Center

HRMVA performed retrofit work to enable highly complicated gas delivery the largest Wound Care Center in the region
Shawmut Design and Construction

Nobu Hotel Chicago

SMS performed a multi-year installation on this new luxury hotel with 115 guest suites and a marquee restaurant on the ground floor
DPR Construction

West Campus Utility Plant – College of William and Mary

HRMVA performed an installation on a utility plant that provides heating and cooling to a large portion of the campus
Pepper Construction

Chamberlain Group HQ

SMS was chosen to deliver HVAC and mechanical installation for Chamberlain Group’s brand new HQ housing an R&D lab for developing tech
WM Jordan

NASA Mars Science Labratory

HRMVA performed installation of a highly precise heating, cooling, and plumbing systems for this building housing 40 modular laboratories
NAVFAC

Joint Expeditionary Base Little Creek-Fort Story

HRMVA performed retrofit work for barracks with a full complement of recreational, fitness, dining, religious, educational amenities
Focus Construction Group

167 N. Green

SMS performed VRF installations on this marquee 17-story office building with both retail and office components in Fulton Market in Chicago

Solutions

Design & Engineering

We offer comprehensive design and engineering services for a wide range of projects in various markets, including design-build and design-assist projects; value-assisted engineering for plan and spec; and turnkey installations.

HVAC Installation

Our trained and skilled union professionals have extensive experience in the installation of HVAC systems in diverse projects — from new systems to renovation and replacement of systems in existing buildings.

Preventative Maintenance & Service

Our maintenance staff strives to provide one thing — excellent customer service. Whether you are looking for commercial HVAC maintenance, service or equipment repairs, we have a solution that meets your needs.

Process Piping

When our clients requirements go beyond traditional plumbing needs, we offer capabilities–including design support and construction services–for complex process piping systems
